GoGet Web/App

InVision

GoGet is a community focused errands and delivery service, currently operating in Kuala Lumpur.

When I met the founders, Fran and Fung had version 1 of their site up and running. A (Twitter) bootstrapped, no-frills but just about functional site.

This was a bit tricker than it seemed at first glance. There were two separate user journeys, GoGetter (I run errands) and Poster (I want someone to run an errand) with the ability for the user to switch between the two.

I used a modified version of Google Ventures’ Design Sprint methodology to tackle this problem.
